wikipedia_page.main: Scott Fraser McKenna (born 12 November 1996) is a Scottish professional footballer, who plays as a defender for Championship club Nottingham Forest and the Scotland national team. McKenna has also previously played for Aberdeen as well as Ayr United and Alloa Athletic on loan.

response: *Scott McKenna, professional footballer playing for Nottingham Forest and Scotland, grew up in Kirriemuir and attended Websters High School.
